## IChartComponent.updateOnNextFrame() method

Interaction handlers will be updated after a timeout defined in [IChartConfig.updateOptions](./core.ichartconfig.updateoptions.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updateOnNextFrame(plot?: IPlot<IPlotRange, unknown>, updateInteractionHandler?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  plot | [IPlot](./core.iplot.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IPlotRange](./core.iplotrange.md)<!-- -->, unknown&gt; | The plot to update. |
|  updateInteractionHandler | boolean | Whether the plot's interaction handler should be updated, default <code>true</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
